entry.title: How to Build a Website (1. Introduction)
entry.content:
How to Build a Website (1. Introduction)

This is a tutorial for building your own website.
I will share two easy methods to build a website for yourself.

Introduction of two methods

  • Virtual server + WordPress
    Building the evironment on the server is a huge work load. But creating and maintaining your website through WordPress is quite easy and relaxing.
    This method need to buy a virtual server and a domain name. But you can use that server to build a VPN (tutorial for it is upcoming).
    More professional. Can create dynamic webpage.
  • GitHub Page + Hexo
    Do not need evironment building. Creating is very very easy. But maintaining it needs a little more knowledge and work load. Static webpage.
    Don’t need to buy a server. And if you don’t care about the domain name, you even don’t need to buy a domain name.

How to choose method

Virtual server + WordPress

  • If you need more storage for your website.
  • If you need dynamic webpage.
  • If you also wanna build a VPN.

GitHub Page + Hexo

  • If you create for fun or self-introduction.
  • If you don’t want spend too much money on it.
